articles.description: Tom Petty's family says I Won't Back Down was written "for the common man" and they don't want it used for a "campaign of hate".

articles.author: Joshua Rivera
articles.title: Perry Mason review: HBO’s reboot is an exercise in style over substance - The Verge
articles.description: Matthew Rhys stars as Perry Mason in HBO’s reboot, which is gorgeous to look at and sink into. It’s just frustratingly messy for a show so lovingly put together.
articles.content:
The HBO miniseries is a gorgeous exercise in style over substance
Photo: HBO
In an era where everything is up for grabs for rebooting, Perry Mason is one of the strangest. The show takes its name f… [+3929 chars]

articles.title: Louise Redknapp ready to start dating again after divorce as son said it was OK - Mirror Online
articles.description: The ex-Eternal star split from husband Jamie after their 19-year marriage crumbled in 2017 and only now her eldest son Charley has given the green light for her to find a new man
articles.content:
Louise Redknapp is ready to start looking for love again - but only after her young son gave her the go-ahead.
